rooms.name: Spawn
rooms.description: You are spawned. There is a bomb that you have to find and defuse to save humanity. Find the bomb, dodge and kill atackers, and save humanity. There is an odin laying on the ground. You have two choices: You can go east towards B site or west towards A-site.

rooms.name: B-Hall
rooms.description: You are in a hall that leads towards B-Main. There is an operator in fornt of you. There is a door on the south side of the hall and there is an opening on the north side that leads to another room.

rooms.name: B-Elbow
rooms.description: You are in an elbow shaped hall. At the end of the hall there is an opening leading to a huge site. There is an machine gun in this room. You can go to B-Hall or you can go to the huge site.

rooms.name: B-Main
rooms.description: You are in a huge site with sand surrounding you. There is an attacker waiting to hurt you. You have five choices: You can go to B-hall, B-Elbow, Garage, Hookah, or you can shoot at the attacker.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: You are in a room with dark walls surrounding you. There is a Vandal in this room. You can go to B-Hall or you can go to B-Lobby. If you go to B-Lobby you can teleport to A site.

rooms.name: B-Lobby
rooms.description: You are in a long hall that leads to the open dessert. You can go into the teleporter to go to either Fountain or Hookah, however if you go into the teleporter you cannot go back to B-lobby. You can go to Garage that leads to B-Main or you can go to Fountain, however there is an attacker waiting for you at the entrance.

rooms.name: Fountain
rooms.description: You are in a an outdoor area with a huge fountain that stands in the middle. It seems like this is the only water source here. There is also a Specter. You have many options: you can go to B-Lobby, Sahara, Cafeteria or to Mid.

rooms.name: Sahara
rooms.description: You're in a room with dusty old walls and sand as floor. You can go to Fountain, Hookah which leads to B-Main or Cafeteria which leads to A-Hall.

rooms.name: Hookah
rooms.description: You're in a room that looks like a balcony, behind a box is an attacker waiting to shoot you. You can go to Cafeteria, to A-Main, or you can shoot the attacker.

rooms.name: Mid
rooms.description: You're in a long hall that is covered in sand and cacti. There is a Marshal on the floor. There is an attacker hiding behind a cactus. You can shoot the attacker, go to Cafteria, A-Hall or to Fountain.

rooms.name: A-Hall
rooms.description: You're in a room covered with weird paintings. There is an attacker standing beside the teleporter. You can shoot him or you can go towards Showers or Hiding Spot which both lead to A-Main, or you can go to Mid.

rooms.name: Showers
rooms.description: You're in an L-shaped room with water trickling down the wall. There is an Ares in the room. There is an attacker waiting for you in the corner. You can shoot the attacker, go to A-Main, or go to A-Hall.

rooms.name: Hiding Spot
rooms.description: You are in a room that seems almost hidden. You found a Fireball on the floor. You can go to A-Hall, Cafeteria, or to Living Room.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a couch. There is a Phantom beside the couch. You can go to A-Main, Camps, Hiding Spot, or you can go to teleporter that leads to mid or garage, but if you go into the teleporter you can't go back.

rooms.name: Camps
rooms.description: You are in a small room with a box in the corner. There is also a grenade on the floor. There is an attacker waiting for you behind them. You can attack them, go to A-Hall, or go to A-Main.

rooms.name: A-Main
rooms.description: You are in a huge site. In the middle of the site there is an attacker. You can shoot the attacker, go to A-Elbow, Camps, Living Room, or Showers.

rooms.name: A-Elbow
rooms.description: You are in an L-Shaped room that leads to A-site. You can go to Spawn, or to A-Main.

rooms.name: Haven
rooms.description: You are in a balcony that stares into A-Main. You can jump down to A-Main, or you can go to Spawn.

rooms.name: Teleporter A
rooms.description: You are in Teleport-A, you have two options, you can teleport to Garage or Mid.

rooms.name: Teleporter B
rooms.description: You are in Teleport-B, you have two options, you can teleport to Fountain or Hookah.
